rule: 1. The Petting Top List is updated every Monday at 00:00.
2. Only comfortable cat petting will be included in the List.
3. If users have the same value, rankings are determined by time order.
4. Only the top 100 users are displayed on the List.
5. For any questions, please go to "Us">"Feedback" to submit your inquiry.

newpet_growth_progress_tracking: Only {num} Growth Points left until the next level!
newpet_pet_preference_user_specific: It seems {petname} likes {username} a little more~
newpet_cat_care_affection_game: Care for your cat to earn Affection Value. Whoever cares more gets more love!
pet_FeedingGuide_pet_props_interaction_e: Use food, toys or cleaning items to increase your pet's Satiety/Mood/Sparkel Levels!
pet_FeedingGuide_pet_growth_upgrade:
When the Growth Value reaches a certain level, your pet will level up and earn special rewards.
As long as your pet stays healthy, the Growth Value will keep increasing. Some items can also boost the value~
pet_FeedingGuide_83bbcd7e: Higher Affection Value unlocks additional pet animations and interactions.
pet_FeedingGuide_pet_custody_fee_reclaim: Pets left unattended for an extended period will be placed under Couple2 Community Care. Owners may reclaim their pets by paying a care fee.
pet_FeedingGuide_user_feedback_center: If you have any other questions, please contact us via the Feedback Center.
pet_FeedingGuide_pet_health_values_track: To stay healthy, your pet needs to maintain optimal Satiety/Mood/Sparkle Levels. They drop by 1% every 20 minutes. Be sure to keep an eye on these values and maintain them at a healthy level.
newpet_growth_notice: {name}'s love is not biased; it depends on all of you equally~
